item.title: Trump CMS nominee Dr. Oz won't commit to opposing Medicaid cuts
item.description: President Donald Trump has promised to preserve Medicaid and other federal safety-net programs.

item.title: The U.S.-Canada trade war could signal a shift in economic ties, experts say
item.description: The U.S.-Canada trade war could shift economic ties as tariffs rise and tensions grow, raising concerns about future trade stability, experts say.

item.title: Mark Carney sworn in as Canadian prime minister, now must face Trump
item.description: The 59-year-old becomes the first Canadian prime minister without any serious political experience.

item.title: More than 50 universities face federal investigations as part of Trump's anti-DEI campaign
item.description: The group of colleges facing scrutiny over ties to the PhD Project include major public universities and prestigious private schools like Yale.

item.title: Trump says 'very good chance' of Ukraine ceasefire while Russia keeps caveats
item.description: Russia struck a sedate tone on Friday but acknowledged grounds for cautious optimism, after only backing the "idea" of a U.S. brokered 30-day ceasefir...
